description:
vorlauf is an open-source Untappd client designed for Enyo & the HP TouchPad. Check-in to beers, toast & comment on your friends' check-ins, view check-in photos, view user profiles, & more.

New in version 0.4.0:
- Fixed tapping on wish list beers.
- Tapping on a pending friendship item goes to that user's profile.
- Don't dismiss the add comment dialog with a click.
- Added check-in image viewing.
- Put a small border around the selected box in user's profile view.
